jcolibri.cbrcase
Interface Connector

All Known Implementing Classes:
JDBCConnector, JenaConnector, PlainTextConnector, RestaurantsConnector
public interface Connector

Connector interface declares the methodd needed to be implemented by the classes that will access to the cases from the phisical storage.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String CONFIG_FILE
          Defines the property used by the implementations of this interface to obtain the XML configuration file
 
Method Summary
 void close()
          Cleanup any resource that the connector might be using, and suspends the service

          Deletes given cases for the storage media
 void init(java.util.Properties props)
          Initialices the connector with the given properties
 java.util.Collection<CBRCase> retrieveAllCases()
          Returns max cases without any special consideration
 java.util.Collection<CBRCase> retrieveSomeCases(java.lang.String filter)
          Retrieves some cases depending on the filter.
 void storeCases(java.util.Collection<CBRCase> cases)
          Stores given classes on the storage media
